'''13w47d''' is the fourth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.7.4]], released on November 22, 2013<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|403884836429234176|Minecraft 13w47d has been released to address some streaming issues.|November 22, 2013}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w47a]], [[13w47b]] and [[13w47c]] snapshots.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w47d|prefix=Minecraft
|;dev
|35296|Draw order-related graphical errors involving stained glass.
|35561|Players can see a stained glass pane clearer through stained glass.
|35694|Stained glass texture different while in Creative-"Survival Inventory".
|;prev
|40255|Falling invisible slime causes "blue screen".
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 13w47d was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
